home.title: Welcome to the Canine Diagnosis System
home.descriptionTitle: Illness cases in dogs can be more complicated than systemic diagnoses. Please consult a medical professional. If there are symptoms of concern Our service is not a doctor's diagnosis. But it's just a preliminary information.

termPage.title: Term of service!
termPage.description: Before using the check Please read the terms of service.

two.title: Checkup is not a diagnosis.
two.description: Checkup is for informational purposes and is not a qualified medical opinion.

three.title: Do not use in emergencies.
three.description: In case of health emergency, call your local emergency number immediately.

four.title: Your dog's data is safe.
four.description: The dog information you provide will not be shared with anyone.

termPage.check1: I read and accept Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
termPage.check2: I agree to the processing of my health information for the purpose of performing the interview.
